description: J-RPG Turn Based battle-oriented game. Emphasize on the item's mechanics & gameplay. Made with RPG Maker XP.

description: Sin descripción

name: Iron Harvest: Rusviet Revolution
description: Players will follow an additional story line over the course of four new singleplayer maps, shedding some light on the mysterious Rasputin.

name: Ne no Kami: The Two Princess Knights of Kyoto - Extra Story
description: Ne no Kami - The Two Princess Knights of Kyoto Extra Story features two extra after story chapters.

name: Real Heroes: Firefighter HD
description: In this first-person fire and rescue action game, don the soot-stained boots of an everyday hero, as a newly graduated academy cadet getting their start in a big city fire station. Face the heat on the front line as you save people and animals from fiery danger to become a real hero!

name: Sudden Strike 3: The Last Stand
description: Sin descripción

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Revenge of the Snathi
description: The Snathi have risen from the ashes of their Precursor prison world. Lead this evil new empire of bloodthirsty squirrels to galactic domination in sandbox and their own campaign.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Altarian Prophecy
description: Lead the newly founded Terran Alliance in its first encounter with the Altarian Confederation. Adds two new factions, a 3 mission campaign scenario and more.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Heroes of Star Control - Origins
description: The Tywom, Mu'Kay, Mowlings and other unique alien species from the Star Control: Origins universe have come to Galactic Civilizations III! Each alien race includes a unique leader, ship designs, traits, music, and more.

name: Sid Meier's Alpha Centauri Planetary Pack
description: Sid Meier's Alpha Centauri Planetary Pack includes the original Alpha Centauri and the expansion, Alien Crossfire.

name: Tezz: Portals
description: Tezz: Portals is a block-fit puzzle with portals.

name: Modern Puzzle
description: A beautiful puzzle game in which you have to collect the pieces of animated characters. The game provides a choice of difficulty and any available level to choose from. Time and lives are limited, so hurry up

name: Dungeons of Dredmor: Realm of the Diggle Gods
description: Deep within their underground temples, Lord Dredmor plots the next stage in his campaign of merciless brutality and world-terrorizing.

name: The Desolate Hospital
description: The Desolate Hospital is a horror adventure game where a gas masked man explores a desolate hospital to recover a red jewel. Upon entering, he receives a letter that reads, "If you wish to live, you must completely purge this place.

name: Winter Resort Simulator: TechnoAlpin - Snow Expert Pack
description: This Winter Resort Simulator DLC offers you a variety of new machines, as well as an expansion of existing ones - all are realistic replica by TechnoAlpin with original licenses.

name: Flight of the Amazon Queen: Legacy Edition
description: The Legacy Edition of "Flight of the Amazon Queen", using latest ScummVM software to run on modern platforms (Windows, macOS and Linux).

name: Darksiders: Blades & Whip Franchise Pack
description: A bundle of Darksiders: Warmastered Edition, Darksiders II: Deathinitive Edition, and Darksiders III: Deluxe Edition. The Blades & Whip Franchise Pack also includes access to Darksiders II: Deathinitive Edition Soundtrack.

name: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Complete Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Grimoire: Manastorm - Ice Class
description: Ice is basically a disabling damage dealer. Nearly all of his spells will slow enemy movement but his spells also leave him more vulnerable.

name: Realms of Arkania 1+2
description: Sin descripción

name: Patrician 1+2
description:
In this bundle you can have two great trade games, predecessors to Patrician 3, in the price of just one! Set against the historical backdrop of maritime trade at the time of the Hanseatic League, the Patrician series sees the player take the role of a citizen of a medieval hanseatic town in Northern Europe, between London and Novgorod, with the aim being to rise from the status of an ordinary, unimportant trader to that of a major business tycoon and governor of your hometown.

To achieve this goal, the player must gain the respect and recognition of other inhabitants and try to make a profit through maritime trade, the production of goods and the completion of missions. The player can raise his profile by both improving the city and through diplomacy, or by raising money for his treasury by means of piracy and smuggling - but watch out, others want easy money too, so you would do wise to arm your ships!

name: CyberBorn
description: Welcomme to Cyberborn! A truly Cyberpunk Multiplayer FPS game. The game using Unreal Engine 4 , 5 Different very high detailed maps, with 5 different game modes. 5 Different Class , and 4 different ability. The Game is working on Online , and on LAN as well. Your PC is ready? "No More Future"

name: Aircraft War: Space Wars
description: New DLC has been added to Aircraft War. With this DLC pack, the war has been moved into space. You will fight with your own spaceships against enemy space warships. Space Wars are waiting for you.

name: Into the Pyramid
description: Into the Pyramid is the new multiplayer game from Aisukaze Studio, be part of the team trying to scape from the pyramid or sabotage the mission for your own interests.

name: Don't Miss the King
description: Dont miss the king is a strategy-platformer game that lets you strategize while you are in battle. You will be able to fight using different types of soldiers on many different maps in this game where you have to defeat a dark wizard-king who is trying to take all of humanity under his will.

name: Drabidiboo
description: A strategic game of prediction, collection and magical pets!

name: Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny - With Blade and Brilliance
description: Celebrating the two year anniversary of Realms of Arkania: Blade of Destiny, Crafty Studios is proud to present an eventful blend of extra content - for free.

name: No Turning Back: The Pixel Art Action-Adventure Roguelike - Potions Starter Pack
description: Every time you start a new game you will have access to a selection of 3 randomly generated potions to pick.

name: Dungeon Fighter Online: Dynasty Guardian Pack
description: A special DLC: from Dynasty Guardian avatars to steam exclusive aura avatar, the package contains various useful CERA items! This offer will be available for a limited period of time.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Quinnimont Coal Drag
description: This package includes the "C&O 2-6-6-6 H8" locomotive and a brand new detailed session. Quinnimont was a marshaling yard for coal loads from the surrounding mines. Trains were assembled here to be shipped to Clifton Forge and beyond. Empty cars were also made-up here for the mines in the area.

name: Diamond Hunter
description: A mystery adventure game where you will need to use your orientation skills to avoid getting lost in the mazes.

name: Save the Astronaut
description: You're stranded. Navigate a perilous uncharted world full of freezing waters, and razor sharp rocks. You have ten seconds to breathe. Don't choke.

name: Escape from Kyoto House
description: Your party finds themselves trapped in a Japanese-themed room. Solve puzzles, crack riddles and discover hidden secrets in your adventure to Escape from Kyoto House!

name: Azure Sky
description: Azure Sky is an action, puzzle and platform game. You need to take on the role of a young man, who will later gain power over his consciousness and learn to master magical abilities.

name: Lunar Lich
description: Lunar Lich is a puzzle-solving game including puzzle solving, chasing, dialogue options, and a small amount of battle. The game contains a certain amount of horror effects and jump-scares, but the adventure is more significant. This game is very suitable for leisure and entertainment.

name: Sylphine
description: Discover your destiny in a world where two dimensions collide in a conflict that threatens all life. Explore two unique dimensions, cultivate friendships, and form relationships as you delve into the world of Sylphine!

name: Isles of Cubes
description: Strategy Puzzle Game. Explore and colonize islands. Establish production chains. But your resources and space are limited. You must plan carefully.

name: Nerdland
description: Two best friends (Paul Rudd & Patton Oswalt) make a last ditch effort to become famous, stumbling into a series of misadventures that threaten their lives and dignity.

name: Pinball Gold Pack
description: The Pinball Gold Pack collects all 20 tables from the first five pinball compilations by 21st Century Entertainment onto one CD.

name: Caveblazers: Arena Mode
description: The Arena Expansion for Caveblazers introduces a ridiculous new game mode. Fight your way through waves of deadly monsters in a variety of fully destructible stages! Collect packs of cards as you level up in the arena - complete with a fancy pack opening animation!

name: UnderRail: Expedition
description: Take a break from the usual metro-crawling to take a boat to the infamous Black Sea. There, among the ruins of an age long past, you’ll face the vicious fauna, hostile natives, cunning pirates, and something far more sinister than all of those.

name: AI War: DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Epic Map Pack
description: Play with half a dozen new maps and a new scenario in this first content pack for Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Secret Missions
description: Sin descripción

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Overlord Scenario Pack
description: Conquer your foes in exciting new single-player scenarios that will test your strategy and skill. Then explore new maps that range from 2 player skirmishes all the way up to large, 6-player rumbles.

name: Hyper Knights: Challenges
description: Challenge yourself and climb the leaderboards in these cool unique challenges!

name: Soaring Tales of Skylines
description: After Hong Kong's coup in the 1960s, the economy began to develop, and you have this golden opportunity to develop real estate!

name: Guild of Dungeoneering: Pirates Cove Adventure Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Nikola Tesla: War of the Currents
description: Help the eccentric inventor navigate the intrigue of the emerging electrical industry! Can you outsmart Thomas Edison and electrify the world?

name: Recursive Hate: Spider Hell
description: Try to survive in Spider Hell. Fight with big, realistic and terrifying spiders and versus swarms with literally thousands of spiders.

name: Grass Cutters Academy
description: Are you interested in gardening? painting? how about a mix of both? In Grass Cutters Academy you cut grass for money, spend that money on paint powered auto mowers that get faster, stronger and more efficient with each blade of grass cut

name: Wars Across the World: Fornovo 1495
description: Fornovo 1495 is the story of the first 'War of Italy', with the expedition of French king Charles VIII against Naples. The French objective is to capture the key city of Naples and keep it against their adversaries.

name: Dream Stone 2
description: Escaping from the dream still continues on the sequel of Dream Stone.

name: Memory Card Monsters
description: Finding pairs might sound easy, but this game will definitely challenge your brain! Train your memory, concentration, accuracy, attention, the speed of thinking and logic skills and much more. This game is a great way to exercise your memory and keep your brain fit!

name: Robot Rogue
description: Robot Rogue is a turn-based roguelike game featuring skill system. You have 3 skills and each skill have own attack area, attack damage, and cost of use. Cast a best skill on situation, and clear the dungeon!

name: Kenbo
description: On the warpath again comes a former military man named Kenbo, he swore not to kill again, but some special services again want to recruit him, so Kenbo took up arms and promised to kill anyone who comes to him.

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Nyaa Invaders 1
description: About Alien cats are hungry and ready to invade the earth. If you fly the most advanced cat lunch box spaceship, you must feed them before they starve. Save the earth!

name: Pray in VR Medieval Christian Churches
description: The epidemic prevented us from going to church to pray. But we still have a way to pray. In the VR church, hold the cross in your hands, listen to sacred music, and pray to God. A private space for your soul!

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu: Tiger Tank 63
description: Adding weather systems to the battlefield, heavy rains can break walls and cause mud on the ground; persistent rainstorms can make roads water; cooling from snowy days can freeze water; and when temperatures rise, ice and snow melt. The changing weather changed the terrain of the battlefield.

name: The Abnormal Place
description: The Abnormal Place is a game about Abigail, a young woman who has lost her voice and has found herself in a strange resort and hotel inhabited by monsters. Abigail must recover her voice and navigate through the hostile world or she'll be forever trapped.

name: Gratuitous Space Battles: The Parasites
description: If you catch them at the wrong time the parasites are a race to be reckoned with. Every 200 years or so they travel the galaxy looking for new hosts, and we're not suggesting that this is a race that excels at making people feel welcome at parties.

name: A Traveler's Photo Album
description: You will play a traveler, strayed into a castle, the owner of the castle is a candid expert, in the different world travel around the use of magic candid, have a thick album, which is full of treasures! You find the photo album, but the photos in the album are sealed in the room, you need to open it.

name: Muslim 3D
description: Muslim 3D is an educational video game. You begin your journey in a virtual place in the city of Makkah. Interact with other, virtual people, go on adventurous quests, go back in time to relive a historic moment, or perform a Virtual Hajj!

name: Hand of Fate 2: Outlands and Outsiders
description: Hand of Fate 2: Outlands and Outsiders DLC expands the Game of Life and Death with a brand new campaign challenge and a unique companion character.

name: The Incredible Machine Mega Pack
description:
Do you remember watching with amazement when those cartoon heroes constructed machines to catch someone or start something? Those very complicated Rube Goldberg-like ones with knives, toasters, anvils etc? Or did you ever wonder how it would feel to construct a mouse-powered device to cook some eggs and launch a rocket?

Well, the answer is here! Build monkey or mouse-powered machines, use lasers and fire fireworks, start fires using a bowling ball and flint, throw things with anti gravity platforms or a jack-in-the-box or crack open an aquarium with a cat, mouse, alligator, cannon, cheese and more!

Includes Even More Incredible Machine, The Incredible Machine 3 (contains all levels from The Incredible Machine 2), Contraptions and Even More Contraptions

Solve wacky puzzles with even more wacky solutions, using absolutely crazy contraptions

Countless challenges to keep you busy for many days to come

name: Master of Orion 1+2
description: Sin descripción

name: Fisherman Classic
description: Welcome to Fishy Archipelago! Go fishing, catalog your most rare fishes and sea creatures, buy and find skins, hats, boats and properties. Build your fishy empire. The retro world is yours!

name: Dimension Shift
description: Get ready for a challenge! Dimension Shift is a hardcore game for hardcore gamers. Avoid the spikes. Reach the end. It's that simple. Or is it...?

name: Profectus
description:
Rise through the ages.
In Profectus you start with nothing but a world to explore. Your goal is to use what you are given to full extent and work your way up from the stone age into space.

Profectus is unique in that you do not have an inventory, you have to carry everything you own in your hands, on your hips or on your back.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Ultimate Unit Pack
description:
The Ultimate Unit Pack for Europa Universalis IV!

Includes:
Indian Subcontinent Unit Pack
Native Americans II Unit Pack
Muslim Ships Unit Pack
Indian Ships Unit Pack
Colonial British and French Unit Pack
Catholic League Unit Pack
Conquistadors Unit Pack
Trade Nations Unit Pack
Evangelical Union Unit Pack

name: Europa Universalis IV: Conquistadors Unit Pack
description: Europa Universalis IV: Conquistadors Unit Pack contains a total of 16 new models for Spanish and Portuguese armies fighting in the new world.With a more rugged appearance, Spanish and Portuguese armies operating in the New World will have their own unique look, enhancing your visual Europa Universalis IV experience.

name: Dead in Vinland: Endless Mode - Battle of the Heodenings
description: Named after the tale of an endless battle from Norse mythology, this second DLC for Dead In Vinland unlocks a new Endless, sandboxy, survival mode!

name: Europa Universalis IV: Trade Nations Unit Pack
description: Europa Universalis IV: Trade Nations Unit Pack adds 16 new unique models. Aragon, Genoa, Novgorod and Lubeck will each get four new models, enhancing the visual experience of Europa Universalis IV.

name: Tropico 4: Complete DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Europa Universalis IV: Evangelical Union Unit Pack
description: Europa Universalis IV: Evangelical Union Unit Pack adds 12 new units models for the members of the Evangelical Union.

name: BlockWorld
description: BlockWorld is a Multiplayer Voxel sandbox full of toys and creatures! Powered by the Hazzah Engine, you can go beyond blocks and really build amazing things. Come on in and build worlds with your friends!

name: Purgo Box
description: This game is an online multiplayer game created in RPG Tutool. Collect items, increase the heroine's sensitivity, and aim for the ending.

name: 摆地摊
description: Sin descripción

name: Europa Universalis IV: Native Americans Unit Pack
description: Europa Universalis IV: Native Americans Unit Pack contains new unique unit models for eight Native American tribes.This DLC adds unique flavor to the North American continent and enhances the visual experience of Europa Universalis IV. Huron Cherokee Creek Shawnee Iroqouius Comanche Sioux Apache

name: Europa Universalis IV: Native Americans II Unit Pack
description: Europa Universalis IV: Native Americans II Unit Pack contains new unique unit models for ten Native American tribes. Mikmaq Potawatomi Chickasaw Miami Navajo Mohican Assiniboine Ojibwe Fox ShoshonneThis DLC adds unique flavor to the North American continent and enhances the visual experience of Europa Universalis IV.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Colonial British and French Unit Pack
description: Europa Universalis IV: Colonial British and French Unit Pack contains 16 new unique unit models for British and French colonial troops.The armies of Great Britain, England and France will receive a new, more rugged look while in the New World.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Muslim Ships Unit Pack
description: Europa Universalis IV: Muslim Ships Unit Pack adds 12 new unique ships for Muslim nations.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Indian Ships Unit Pack
description: Europa Universalis IV: Indian Ships Unit Pack adds 12 new unique ships for Indian nations. These ships will enhance the visual appeal of Europa Universalis IV.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Indian Subcontinent Unit Pack
description: Europa Universalis IV: Indian Subcontinent Unit Pack adds new units for Vijayanagar, Bengal, Hindu and Muslim parts of India These units will enhance the visual appeal of Europa Universalis IV.

name: Shadows: Awakening - Necrophage's Curse
description: Gear up, pull yourself together and set off to confront the Necrophage – the Eater of the Dead – before it’s too late.

name: Shadows: Awakening - The Chromaton Chronicles
description: Shadows: Awakening – The Chromaton Chronicles leads you to the northern edge of Thole. There lies the mysterious Arcanum Laboratory – a long since abandoned place known for its ruthless and immoral magical experiments.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Catholic League Unit Pack
description: Europa Universalis IV: Catholic League Unit Pack adds 12 new units models for the members of the Catholic League.

name: Goliath: Summertime Gnarkness
description: The first DLC expansion for Goliath adds four new Goliath types, Epic Weapons and more - all for free!

name: Epic Pinball: The Complete Collection
description: This release is an Epic Pinball compilation with some exclusive content. It includes the first 8 tables plus the tables: Cyborgirl, Pangaea, Space Journey, Toy Factory and African Safari.

name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Xtreme Legends Complete Edition - Powerful Weapon Pack
description: 12 additional stages will be added to Free Mode in which new powerful versions of all 77 weapon types will be available to acquire.

name: Hentai Fighter
description: Hentai Fighter is a classic fighting game with sexy anime girls inspired by classical fighting games. Easy to learn and play!

name: Tower!2011:SE - Orlando KMCO Airport
description: Orlando International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: WWE 2K18: Cena (Nuff) Pack
description: Celebrate the 15th anniversary of one of the most beloved, and divisive WWE Superstars in history with exclusive digital content! Play as two of John Cena’s fiercest rivals over his career, Rob Van Dam and Batista! You also receive two versions of John Cena (2001 & 2006)!

name: Train Simulator 2021: BR Class 07 Loco Add-On
description: One of the smallest classes of diesel shunters built for workings around one of the UK's largest dockyards is now here for Train Simulator 2021. The diminutive 0-6-0 Class 07 shunter was designed specifically for use within Southampton Dockyard and to replace aging tank steam locomotives used previously.

name: Microcosmum: Survival of Cells - Campaign "Hot and Cold"
description: We present you a new additional campaign of 50 missions. Temperature fluctuations appeared in the microcosmum. Now microorganisms slow down in cold areas and accelerate in warm ones. Use it in your tactics!

name: The Unexpected Quest Prologue
description: Adventure game with strategy and management elements in a medieval fantasy setting - drawing inspiration from classic games of the genre. In this prologue, play through chapters 1, 2, and 3, where you learn to manage your resources as you build and battle to bring order to the world.

name: Table Top Racing: World Tour - Tropical Ice Pack
description: Table Top Racing continues its world tour with the all-new Tropical Ice Pack. Introducing two new and exciting locations; 'Life's A Beach' the Brazilian juice bar and the luxury Alpine resort, 'Yellowsnow Piste'.

name: Heroes of Normandie: 21st Panzer Division
description: Heroes of Normandie: 21st Panzer Division is the second expansion for the acclaimed and fast paced tactical game Heroes of Normandie. Lead many new units from the tough german 21st Panzer Division and show those Yankees that you mean business!

name: Game Tengoku CruisinMix Special: Clarice
description: Clarice, the heroine of Jaleco's City Connection/Cruisin, flies (drives?) into action with this DLC. A new character, exclusive music track and new entry to the Data Mode HD library are yours to enjoy!

name: Train Simulator 2021: Western Sichuan Pass: Dujiangyan - Maoxian & Mashancun Route Add-On
description: The Western Sichuan Pass delivers unique mountainside passenger operations throughout the Sichuan province of Southwest China, and is brought to life, courtesy of Partner Programme developer, Simtech Vision.

name: The Trap
description: You got trapped in the labyrinth and need to find an exit. All you got is an old flashlight, while world around is trying to get rid of you! Use flashlight to resist darkness and evil, solve puzzles and explore dungeons and nether realms in The Trap, dark arcade adventure psychological horror!

name: Data Mining 8
description: Data Mining 8 is a casual colorful minimalist puzzle in which you have to collect all the files that are not corrupted to exit the closed circle.

name: Fantasy Mosaics 34: Zen Garden
description: The penguin family discovered a "Zen" way to play multi-color mosaic puzzles.

name: The Arcadia of Wulin
description: The Arcadia Of Wulin is a relaxed and casual individual independent game with the theme of construction and management. In the game, you will create a beautiful and prosperous paradise from nothing. Carefully plan each building, so that the building will have a sense of heaven and earth, so that the residents living here can comprehend the peerless martial arts. Here are the masters from outside the world, and here are the knights who return to hermit.

name: Battle Brothers: Lindwurm
description: Challenge your mercenary company against a fearsome Lindwurm, an adversary of legend, home to the wild parts of the world and fiercely defending its hoard of treasure.

name: Infinite Dungeon Crawler: The Infernal Dungeons
description: The Infernal Dungeons DLC opens up another world that you can travel to when you go through the Gate. Fight ghastly creatures like gnolls, gargoyles, and the lich in a truly "dungeon" type of world. NOTE: You must unlock the base game to load this expansion pack.

name: Endless Furry Killer 3D
description: Endless Furry Killer 3D is the second installment of the Endless Furry Series! The game is currently a work in progress.

name: The Surge 2: Future Shock Weapon Pack
description: Expand your The Surge 2 experience with the Future Shock Weapon Pack and get access to 4 new devastating weapons from the shadiest corners of Jericho City. The quarantine has sparked a surge in black market activities that unearthed previously secret projects.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf - Wrath of the Damned
description: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf is a card-driven turn-based tactical game which features RPG elements, containing a single player campaign, survival and PvP modes. Win these battles using the arsenal of weapons, abilities and cunning of the sky warriors. The Wrath of the Damned DLC includes a new PvE arena marking the next step in the evolution of the acclaimed The Fall of Kanak mode, new heroes, and a new set of cards for the main game and new achievements.

name: Pathfinder Adventures: Rise of the Goblins
description: The Rise of the Goblins takes place in an alternate version of the Rise of the Runelords, where the heroes are the Goblins and the villains are the heroes. Goblins Only!

name: Sudoku Time
description: Sudoku Time is a classic logical puzzle with combinatorics of numbers. The goal of the puzzle is to fill in the empty cells with numbers from 1 to 9 so that in each row, in each column, and in each small square (region) 3 × 3, each digit occurs only once. Each puzzle has only one solution!

name: Train Simulator 2021: Montana Hi-Line - Shelby: Havre Route
description: The eastern segment of BNSF's famed and busy Hi-Line Subdivision crosses the magnificent and fertile high plains of Montana - and the remarkable experiences of railroading in America's "Big Sky Country" now comes to Train Simulator 2021 with the Montana Hi-Line route!

name: Holy Whore Emily
description: Making love is joyful. To become a priesthood holder who can keep making love is even more worshiped by the world. Emily loves this kind of life… You will play the role of the High Priestess and arrange for the Holy Maiden Emily to be engaged with various activities and H-acts.

name: American Truck Simulator: Cabin Accessories
description: There is no place like home and for many drivers on the road, their truck cab is their second home. From power inverters to coffee cups, the possibilities for cab customizations are (almost) endless!

name: Fairy Godmother Stories: Dark Deal - Collector's Edition
description:
This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version. The Collector's Edition includes: defeat an evil witch's fairy-tale guards in the bonus game; replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games; tons of morphs and collectibles to find; strategy guide, exclusive wallpapers, concept art, music, videos, and more!

The Collector’s Edition includes:
- Defeat an evil witch's fairy-tale guards in the bonus game!
- Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games!
- Tons of morphs and collectibles to find, including coins you can use to purchase fairy-tale memorabilia!
- Enjoy exclusive wallpapers, concept art, music, videos, and more!
- Never get lost with the strategy guide!

name: Fairy Godmother Stories: Dark Deal
description: Domini Games proudly brings you the follow up to the modern fairy tale original in Fairy Godmother Stories: Dark Deal! Grab your magic wand and step into the shoes of a real fairy godmother in this spell-binding Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

name: Death Dream
description: You find yourself in a galaxy with maps, on maps you can survive, build cities, extract resources, trade, defend against enemies, maps can be opened in a dream, when you make your bed and fall asleep, then you may dream of a quest, for example, a battle with a dragon, or dialogue with AI

name: 100% Orange Juice: Kiriko & NoName Pack
description: 100% Orange Juice: Kiriko & NoName Pack adds 2 new playable characters from developer Orange Juice's games. Meet Team Waruda's crazy doctor Kiriko who lives on the edge, and NoName who is always up to no good. The characters come fully voiced!

name: Slayers, Inc.
description: Slayers, Inc. is a roguelite twin-stick shooter about killing hordes of demons. Acquire items to brutalize them in new and unique ways, empower yourself with Artifacts to kill 'em with style, don't forget to keep your combo going, and give those infernal fools the boot!

name: Hyperspace: Andy's Adventure - Metal Universe
description: Metal Universe is a DLC with completely new theme, immersive atmosphere, great rhythm feel and a new genre. Come and get ready to rock!

name: World of Fantasy: Zero
description: World of Fantasy is a round action Stratigie game with crafting system and you can get in gear crystals puregive to make them even stronger it also has a day-night system

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Animals
description: If you like puzzles and animals this is the right game for you, Jigsaw Puzzle: Animals is a minimalist game with 5 difficulty levels (60, 112, 273, 476 and 714 pieces) with an animal theme.

name: Tales of Lagoona 3: Frauds, Forgeries, and Fishsticks
description: Return to Lagoona at the bottom of the sea for a new Hidden Object adventure! Poseidon Park is in trouble once again as the latest repairs have gone horribly awry. Mayor Finn has disappeared and Leona and Theo are desperate to save the park.

name: Beats Fever: Big Apple
description: Big Apple is the first DLC for the acclaimed VR music game Beats Fever. This pack contains the new urban stage of New York and 10 new music levels.

name: Sir Stretchalot
description: Put on the helmet and become more than a man. Become Sir Stretchalot, a Stretcher who travels the land, saving the day and stretching hotties, whether they be Monster Girls or regular girls. Sir Stretchalot is an episodic experience. New episodes will be added regularly.

name: Crazy Ball Adventures: Treasure
description: Crazy Ball Adventures: Treasure is a 3D gravity balance ball game. You will experience a combination of puzzle and game entertainment. This DLC features a different gameplay to the Crazy Ball series. The player's goal is to collect stars in a short period of time. There is a minimum number of stars required to be collected in order to pass each level.

name: World of Warships: Anshan Pack
description: The Soviet-designed destroyer Anshan sports powerful stealth-torpedoing capabilities and an improved AA defense to deal with those pesky bombers that get too close! Add her to your Port today together with 1,500 Doubloons and a skilled Commander!

name: Requiem
description: Requiem stars Isaiah, as he relives his memories and must defeat the demons that inhabit himself. Delving through surreal realms pocketed throughout the cathedral, Isaiah must confront his deadly sins by warding them off in unique worlds and boss battles.

name: Blood Code: Costume Pack
description: This Costume Pack contains 4 costumes with bonus effects.

name: Sometimes Always Monsters: Author Outfits
description: Get fresh new looks for each of the writers, with the Author Outfits DLC Pack. Including redesigned sprites, portraits, and animations, this visual makeover will add new life and new style to your second (or twenty-second) play through of Sometimes Always Monsters.

name: TrackMaster: Free For All Motorsport
description: TrackMaster is an all-terrain, all-vehicles, physics based sandbox and racing game: play whatever way you want, in any kind of track and event, with any vehicle!

name: World of Guns VR: Guns Full Access
description: World of Guns VR: Guns Full Access unlocks all existing and future released gun models for World of Guns: VR Currently there are 190 +gun models in the game. Attention! Full Access does not unlock Bonus models!

name: Cube Full of Mines: Slate Map
description: Peaceful serenity is threatened by a Cube Full of Mines. This DLC contains one brand new selectable theme to play. Experience the same gameplay you love from Cube Full of Mines in a brand new environment... Slate!

name: Tropico 5: Gone Green
description: Tropico 5: Gone Green includes a new standalone scenario, a new building, a new dynasty avatar accessory, a new sandbox map, and a new music track and additional voice recordings.

name: Levaluhta
description: Levaluhta, an exquisite black and white graphics game, is an Eldercare noir horror story set in Orismala, Finland. It's dynamic modern gameplay is inspired by classic adventure and horror games.

name: The Bible: Exodus
description: The Bible: Exodus is a third person melee combat game based on the most read book: The Bible. Come to know, participate and help the God's people to arrive on the promise land. Fighting against different kind of enemies.

name: Remember When
description: The story follows a phone call between Noah and his wife, Sarah as they recall pivotal moments in their relationship. Peer into Noah's memories and relive the couple's happiest moments through choice based dialogue, a unique art-style, and an original soundtrack in this fully voice acted experience.

name: Portal Defect
description: Portal Defect is a Top-Down Roguelite set in the Future and you are an agent sent to the past to alter it. But something goes wrong!....Will you be able to escape time and space and return home? or will you die trying?

name: Polyforce WW2
description: Polyforce WW2 is the Online First-Person Shooter game that describes the World War 2. In Polyforce WW2, you can choose the Axis and Allied side, and you can see and experience how destructive the war was!

name: Berserk Soccer
description: A soccer game with a brutal playing style.

name: Skyjunk
description: Blast and slash your way across the sky in this action roguelite. Armed with your grappling hook and an array of ingenious weapons and gadgets, contend with a mechanized army in procedurally generated levels.

name: Pop'n Music Kaimei Riddles
description: The 26th mainline arcade release of Konami's 9-button rhythm game series pop'n music. The theme of this iteration is "Japanese Style Detective Novel"

name: Seiso Master KEN
description: A 2D action game full of speed. Various playable characters go through the flames and aim for whales.

name: XXZ: XXL - Dead Souls
description: A married couple is going to fight against pretty Zombie girls. New game mechanics in the already-discovered XXZ world.

name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Blazing Guns
description: The appearance of the first tanks on the battlefields led to a global change of the principles of the warfare.The tactic of using tanks was improved more and more and their number has steadily grown since the day of the battle on Somme in 1916 and till the end of the combat actions.

name: Death Rattle: Hell Unleashed
description: A first person shooter set in a medieval world ravaged by the ungodly forces of the hellion. You are the Death Rattle - humanity's last hope against the forces of hell. Use your special gifts and divine powers to challenge the marches of hell and turn the tide against these devils and demons.

name: Drop Blox
description: Drop Blox is a time management strategy game where colored Blox continuously drop into space. Quickly match the colored Blox with their person before they overflow out of bounds.

name: LuLu Looking For Dogs
description: LuLu Looking For Dogs is a horizontal action platform game. LuLu embarks on a journey to save her dog. On this dangerous journey, you will guide LuLu across traps, avoid enemy attacks, unlock the switch, and finally rescue her pet dog.

name: Xol
description: Ball meets cubes. A love story in the making. And a tough Isometric Physics Platformer.

name: Nonestory P1
description: Nonestory is an RPG game that tells the entertaining story of one man who decided to prove his case to everyone to the world.

name: Hotel Renovation 2
description: This Hotel remembers better times. But thanks to you, they can come back. Renew the rooms. Plan the furniture. Upgrade rooms. Now is the time to reopen and count your profits.

name: Rally Mechanic Simulator
description: Take your opportunity as a real Rally Mechanic. Overcome all the obstacles that the reckless racers throw at you - including unrepairable parts, time limitations and more. Take good care of your rally cars so that on the next special they will perform as good as if they came out of the factory.

name: Claire's Cruisin' Cafe
description: Set off on a cross-country journey to feed the famished masses from your gourmet food truck! Packed with lively characters and addictive gameplay, Claire's Cruisin' Cafe will satisfying your craving for fun even as it leaves you hungry for more!

name: From the Grave
description: From The Grave is a zombie Survival game where you are placed in a medieval dungeon to fight endless hordes of zombies. This game includes a fully voiced main protagonist, a fully made custom map to explore, and a set of 6 different unique weapons to fight the undead. This creepy atmosphere adventure will feel like a throwback to old zombie games where it's just you, a pistol, and a horde of zombies trying to kill you.

name: Rogues Adventure
description: Rogues Adventure is a puzzle platformer adventure game. Each level has a lot of coins, and there are obstacles that are destroyed when you collect the required amount of coins, and then you can go through the level further. Further on the levels, enemy characters appear, which, like obstacles, prevent your hero from advancing along the level. And also there are various traps and other things that can both interfere and help your character.

name: Terminal Conflict: Flower Power Upgrade Pack
description: Includes the all the goodies from the Terminal Conflict: Commander in Chief Edition; includes the Flower Power Terminal (cosmetic), Steam Achievement, Unique Leaders, Policies, and Decisions.

name: Fear of the Dark
description: Fear Of The Dark is a retro 16-BIT tribute to classic survival horror games from the late 90s.

name: Duck Boy
description: Immerse yourself in stunning locales and discover unique abilities as you navigate the lost world of Avenis and it's many secrets.

name: Fairytale Mosaics: Cinderella
description: Meet a real prince! Help Cinderella get to the ball! Solve enchanted puzzles!

name: GraFi Easter
description: GraFi Easter - casual, colorful, minimalist, physical puzzle with traps, treadmills, portals, easter eggs and changing gravity.

name: Sea Dogs: To Each His Own - Happily Ever After
description: The end is near... One final adventure of Charles de Maure is upon you! Dive into the intrigues between French nobility and British intelligence, reclaim your greatest prize and marry the woman you love!

name: CityRunner
description: Stay alive in CityRunner as you take to the streets of the city, a challenging Near Future Sci-Fi based Platform-Style Runner game. Set the highscore by collecting pickups and powerups and staying alive as long as possible to gain the high-score.

name: Neon Light
description: You have to play as a little boy who found himself on an unknown and forgotten planet, now you need to do everything to leave it.

name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Video Game Adventure
description: Bill & Ted's Excellent Video Game Adventure is a Nintendo Entertainment System adventure game based off of the Bill & Ted franchise. It was developed by Rocket Science and released in 1991 as a continuation of the film "Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure".

name: Glass Masquerade: Halloween Puzzle Pack
description: The Halloween Puzzle Pack contains 5 new puzzles across the globe, including free 'Ireland' demo puzzle.

name: The Eye of Borrack: Tangled Tales
description:
Ever wondered what else goes on in the strange setting that surrounds the tale of Borrack? Well, now you can.

Play Tangled Tales as either Cinderella or Prince Charming as you attempt to find your way back to the family castle in time for your friend's wedding, encountering all manner of rude, annoying and often unhelpful fairy tale folk, intent it seems, on hindering you.

name: Mansions of Madness: Altered Fates
description: Lady Helena, the woman who hired you, is abducted through a polychromatic portal before your eyes! With the portal closing and only moments to act, you must decide who will follow into the unknown. Will you be able to work together even while torn apart?

name: TV Kid
description: TV Kid is an addicting roguelike clicker game with endless possibilities for item combinations! Click through channel after channel and try to defeat television itself!

name: Ascent
description: Ascent is an esoteric 2D platformer about a creature stuck in a 2D world

name: Broadside: Perilous Waters
description: Rule the high seas in Broadside: Perilous Waters! Sail the world, sink enemies, join forces with friends, defend your nation from other warring nations or pirates in this free to play MMO.

name: Destined to Die
description: Destined to Die is a task managing game about depression, containing over 1000+ pieces of physical and digital art. What's the point in life, if all paths lead to death. Choose your actions, and learn how to live. All paths lead to death, but how long can you live?

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel - Shining Pom Bait Pack 2
description: This pack contains 3 consumable baits that, when used, will lure out an elusive Shining Pom. Defeating these rare creatures in battle will reward a massive amount of EXP, helping your party reach new heights. Once used, they will disappear from your inventory.

name: Table Tennis Pro
description: The Ultimate Table Tennis (Ping-Pong) Simulator!

name: Inland
description: Inland - is a fast paced runner game. You run forward and you need to dodge dark obstacles, for each obstacle you overcome, you get one point. But if you run into at least one, you will immediately lose. How many points can you get?

name: Dead or Alive 6: Tamaki & Debut Costume Set
description: This set includes Tamaki and the set of 5 debut costumes for her.

name: Dead or Alive 6: Mai Shiranui
description: Download this to use Mai Shiranui in DEAD OR ALIVE 6 and DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters.

name: Dead or Alive 6: Tina
description: Download this to use Tina in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game. (This content may be offered for free for a limited period of time.)

name: Dead or Alive 6: Rachel & Debut Costume Set
description: This set includes Rachel and the set of 5 debut costumes for her.

name: Dead or Alive 6: Kula Diamond
description: Download this to use Kula Diamond in DEAD OR ALIVE 6 and DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters.

name: Medic: Pacific War
description: Become a medic - the true hero of war. Survive the horrors of the battlefield, dodge the bullets, and bring salvation to the wounded. Be their last hope in the chaotic reality of the Pacific Front. Patch, revive, and carry them to change the course of the battle! Be ready to make hard choices!

name: Dead or Alive 6: Jann Lee
description: Download this to use Jann Lee in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game. (This content may be offered for free for a limited period of time.)

description: Download this to use Momiji in DEAD OR ALIVE 6 and DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters.

description: Download this to use Bayman in DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters. Note: This content is only for the holders of the DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters version of the game. (This content may be offered for free for a limited period of time.)

name: Dead or Alive 6: Rachel
description: Download this to use Rachel in DEAD OR ALIVE 6 and DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters.

name: Dead or Alive 6: Tamaki
description: Download this to use Tamaki in DEAD OR ALIVE 6 and DEAD OR ALIVE 6: Core Fighters.

name: Smash Up: Awesome Level 9000
description: Add four new totally awesome factions to your Smash Up collection with murderous Killer Plants, mighty Bear Cavalry, spooky Ghosts and inventive Steampunks!

name: Pixel Art: Mash-Up
description: Level up your skills while fighting your way through waves of chaos. Levels are generated at the start of every game and will be different each time you play.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: Shadowfell Conspiracy - Collector's Edition
description: About the Collector’s Edition Includes The Shadowfell Conspiracy Expansion Pack plus instant access to Purple Dragon Knight Iconic Hero: A stalwart Fighter, cut loose from active service, who can lead the charge with rallying battle-cries.

name: Red Algorithm: Osiris
description: Sin descripción

name: Code: Star Dungeon
description: A multi-role roguelike independent game that needs to collect characters to form a team. Focus on the player's mastery of attacks and skills.

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Left 4 Dead Character Pack 1
description: The four characters from Left 4 Dead join the Resistance in this free Character Pack!

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Undead Airman Character
description: When Plan Z was unleashed, millions of soldiers rose from the dead – but not everyone came back as a mindless ghoul! Hector crashed in the Alps during the Dead War, and isn’t going to let that whole ‘being dead’ thing get in the way of his duty as a gentleman! Just try not to catch yourself on the propeller blade sticking out of his chest.

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Paratrooper Zombie Character
description: It’s time to drop in and unleash hell! When Captain Hector Jennings crashed in the Alps, he left behind more than his life in the snow. With a Paratrooper outfit salvaged from the wreckage of his aircraft, the Undead Airman himself is ready to slay in style and tear apart the undead that snatched his mortality from him in the first place!

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - French Resistance Fighter Character
description: Vive la résistance! A survivor who lost her family to the Nazi scourge, Marie knows the real horror of World War 2 started long before the undead emerged. One of France’s most feared guerilla fighters, she eventually joined the team that ended Hitler’s horrifying Plan Z and never stopped fighting to rid Europe of the undead menace!

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Renegade Officer Character
description: Loyalty to the Fuhrer? Not likely! Werner Sauer was a legend throughout the Afrika Korps for his bravery under fire, but when he put a lethal end to an occult ritual conducted by an SS Officer, he was sent to a penal battalion as punishment.

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - American Sea Captain Character
description: It’s mari-time for mayhem! Josiah, a mischievous sailor, made himself invaluable to the Resistance when he deployed field troops on daring raids across the Mediterranean. Now, he does his part in the zombie kill squads of Italy!

name: Junebug vs. Evil
description: Junebug vs. Evil is a chaotic, survival-horde game that takes inspiration from retro horror movies. Battle your way through waves of evil using anything you can find, from assault rifles to homemade firebombs. The terrors that lurk in these Appalachian woods grow stronger each night, but so do you!

name: Gun Club VR: SWAT DLC
description: SWAT DLC puts you to the test as you master the weapons and tactics needed to become the best of the best. Hone your skills in the intense combat training simulations, face off against waves of hostile targets, and survive the onslaught of the apocalyptic zombie horde.

name: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Dawn of the Dukes
description: Dawn of the Dukes, the second new official expansion to Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition will be available in August 2021!

name: The Lord of the Rings Online: Helm’s Deep - Premium Edition
description:
Helm's Deep Premium Edition - Digital Download includes:
Enforcer of Helm & Avenger of Helm: Exclusive in-game Rohirrim titles
2,000 LOTRO Points for use in the LOTRO Store
Armour of the Hammerhand: An exclusive full set of Rohirrim cosmetic armour
Quest log slots: +10:
Expands your maximum number of active quests by 10 (Quest Slots will not apply to your Monster Play character).
Crystal of Remembrance: Adds one additional legacy to your legendary weapon

name: Star Conflict: Scylla. Deluxe Version
description:
This DLC includes:
Empire engineering frigate “Scylla”.
EM weapon “Energoplasmer”
Active module “Farstation”
CPU modifier “Improved repair algorithms”

Additionally, the pilot receives:
Unique paint “Metal fatigue”.

Additionally, the pilot receives:
Mass Shield Generator.
Nanodrone Cloud.
Energy Emitter.
Autonomous Repair Station.

name: Youmu Konpaku & Dungeon of Lewd Creatures
description: Getting into a hideout of creatures that aim at cute girls, Youmu-chan tries to escape in this side-scroller ACT game!

name: Russian Hentai 3
description: This is the third part of Russian Hentai. This time you have to defend your village from the gopniks.

name: Inflatable doll
description: A beautiful woman will always catch a boy's eye. Where you look depends on your preferences. This game could be the start for you!

name: Puzzle Girl
description: This is a puzzle game to break through and unlock. Every level is a sexy and lovely maid with perfect figure and exposed clothes, which makes players full of fantasy. Players can have a perfect maid when they complete a puzzle.

name: Equestrian Training
description: Alone or with friends, discover a new way to learn more about horses and riding. Based on the official FFE (French horse-riding federation) diplomas, known as Galops, the game helps you improve in the training mode, test your knowledge in the exam mode and have fun with the various mini-games.

name: The Phenomenon of Edgar Allan Poe 1/2
description: A horror novel visual in which you can choose a way, anime style.

name: Code Correction
description: A puzzle game based on parity and hamming codes.

name: Super Squad: Super Pack
description: The Super Squad Super Pack unlocks all Troopers currently in game and all Troopers ever released.

name: Mini Ship Wars
description: Infiltrate the lair enemy, full of traps, labyrinths and warships. You are faced with a difficult task - to get to the very end of the huge sea and defeat every enemy on your way, sailing 18 various locations-labyrinths, solving puzzles and engaging in dangerous battles.

name: Mighty Chameleon Brothers
description: Mighty Chameleon Brothers will remind you of old-school arcade classics, with bright and colorful visuals and fun cartoon characters! You'll love the simple yet addictive game play!

name: The Lost Robot: Jigsaw Puzzle Stories
description: Find help for a lost robot by restoring its memory.

name: Freddy Spaghetti 2
description: Freddy 2.0 is here! Freddy is spaghetti. Oh, and conscious. Freddy 2.0 has got a job! The story starts as you plunge headfirst into the workplace. Overcome the environment, master your spaghetti and run to the coffee machine! Don’t be late on your first day! Freddy Spaghetti uses rope physics to simulate a squishy, stretchy, ropey character.

name: Boog Adventure
description: Can you defeat King Zecto in this fun and rage inducing adventure.....There is only one way to find out......

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Drive on Voronezh
description: Intending to enter Voronezh from the south, on July 4, 1942, units of the German 24 TD crossed the Don river without heavy equipment and began advancing in the direction of Voronezh. 232 RD and 110 TBde were to stand in the breach.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Dawn of Blau
description: First days of the German operation "Blau" in the summer of 1942 in the Oskol river area. Exhausted Red Army forces are in heavy combat with the enemy infantry and tanks rushing to the crossing. Two operations in hilly plains with harsh terrain and extensive gullies.

name: Rise of Warlords
description:
Real-Time Strategy Game
All battles that tak eplace on the map are in real time. You can freely move troops to join or leave a battle, allowing you to use use strategy rather than just simply sending troops and waiting for the battle to end. You can flank enemies, intercept their supplies, or work with allies to surround your enemies.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Dark Forest
description: 53A units conduct stubborn fighting against the German 11AC units west of Kharkov. An exposed seam between 3TD and 168ID units was revealed in the forest south of Polevoe. 252RD, supported by tanks, is preparing to launch a decisive offensive at the junction of German units.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Against the Tide
description: Battle south-west of Kharkov after its liberation in August 1943. The Soviet 5th gds TA and 53A are trying to break through the German defenses in the area of village Korotich, saturated with anti-tank weapons and reinforced with Panther tanks.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Operation Moduler
description: Military clash between Angolans and SADF during Bush War in 1987. On dawn of October 3, the SADF tactical groups and UNITA forces launched an attack on Angolan 47th Brigade.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Tielieketi Incident
description: Military incident between China and Soviet Union during Sino-Soviet split in 1969. On August 13 night, the Chinese covertly concentrated groups of soldiers near the border opposite the disputed area.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Leopard's Leap
description: Military clash between the Angolan army and SADF/SWATF during the Bush War in 1987. A battlegroup of the 32nd SADF and 101st SWATF battalions ambushes the forward elements of the Angolan 21st brigade, along with the first combat use of the Ratel ZT3 ATGM.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Fateful Strike
description: Finale of the Soviet operation to seize Kharkov in May 1942. The Red Army units are slowly moving through German defensive positions with the aim of closing the encirclement around Kharkov. The main strike force is introduced into the battle - the newly created Soviet 21 and 23 tank corps.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Raid
description: The German 320 ID is preparing to break through the encirclement and escape to Kharkov. Armored group of the 2nd MIR LSAH follows to the rescue. Soviet 111 RD reinforced by a ski battalion are trying to hold the encirclement and prevent 320 ID from connecting with own forces.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Cold Spring
description: The offensive operation of 38A from South-Western Front on Kharkov, in May 1942. The Red Army units break through the German defenses in the area of the villages Peschanoe and Nepokrytaya. German units retreat and hastily transfer reserves to this sector of the front line.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Croatian Legion
description: First days of the German operation "Blau" in the summer of 1942 in the Oskol river area. Composite detachment of 13 TC is trying to assist the retreating Soviet rifle divisions, hitting the advancing enemy forces - 369 Croatian reinforced infantry regiment - from the flank.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Strong Point
description: The attack group 605 RR, 232 RD is preparing to force the Don river, near the mouth of the r.Veduga and break through the enemy defense line Gubarevo - svfm Opornyy Punkt. German 387 ID holds a defensive line on the right bank of the Don river.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Furtive Spring
description: The March operation of 38A in the Chuguev-Andreevka area, south-east of Kharkov. The Red Army units are moving through German defensive positions and crossed the r.Severskiy Donets on a broad front. The Germans are retreating, abandoning weapons and vehicles.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Grim of Death
description: The attack group of 8 A, reinforced by a tank battalion, is preparing to break through the enemy defense in the area near village Vinyagolovo. German 96 ID holds the defensive line along the bank of the Mga river.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Black Snow
description: The attack group of 8 A, reinforced with tank breakthrough regiments, is preparing to break through the enemy defense in the area near village Karbusel. German 223 ID occupies the defensive line, dense of engineer installations, developed system of trenches and obstacles, along with minefields.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Typhoon Rising
description: At 7:30 September 30, after a 30 minute artillery barrage the German 24TAC main forces went on the offensive known as Operation Typhoon against the units of the Group of General Ermakov, thus preempting the beginning of the Soviet attack on Glukhov scheduled for the middle of the day.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Final Offensive
description: Units of 4 gds MC broke through the enemy defenses in a small area near Kalinovka village. German infantry and airfield divisions hold two strong points on the flanks of the attacking group. 2 gds MC, 3 and 31 gds RC are preparing to assault them.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - The Day of the Olifant
description: Military clash between Angolans and SADF during Bush War in 1987. Joint attack of two SADF battlegroups on the strong point of the Angolan army near the highway on Cuito-Cuanavale.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Edge of Storm
description: Battered troops of the 38 A are making a fighting retreat under pressure of the Wehrmacht's 6 A and 17 A south of Kharkov. Among them: 169 RD, 199 RD and 14 TBde which has lost more than 50% of personnel and most of its heavy weapons in previous battles.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star - Operation Hooper
description: New battle area - Angola, Cuito-Cuanavale district

name: Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star - Sokolovo 1943
description: Sokolovo 1943 is an addon for Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star, which adds new winter area of operations near the Sokolovo village and new operation for the Red Army (1st Czechoslovak Battalion) in March 1943, 15 turns.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star - Krasnaya Polyana 1943
description: Occupy positions in the Krasnaya Polyana village and break out of the encirclement in the area of Zmiyev en route to Kharkov.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star - Volokonovka 1942
description: Volokonovka 1942 is an addon for Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star, which adds a new summer area of operations - Volokonovka village and new operations for the Red Army and Wehrmacht during Operation Blau (July 1942).

name: Subterrain: Mines of Titan
description: An uncompromising turn-based survival RPG set on Titan. After discovering your stasis pod, a doomed mining camp needs your help to survive the evolving horrors that lurk below. Research and craft equipment, fight against odds, and discover your destiny.

name: Souldiers
description: Fight for your freedom in a sprawling fantasy world caught between the living and the fallen. Hone your skills in a retro epic featuring puzzle platforming, metroidvania exploration and crunchy soulslike combat.

name: Chronicles of Cyberpunk: Deep Sleep
description: Chronicles of cyberpunk - Deep sleep - is an exciting story about the confrontation between Big Brother and Supercomputer in unusual world

name: Warage
description: Warage is a classic RTS that will take you to a magical fantasy world.

name: Warage: Necromancer Campaign
description: 14 missions in which you can fight on the side of the undead against the kingdoms of Abreim.

name: Escherion
description: Embark upon a journey into an inescapable multidimensional prison deep beneath the Underworld. Rediscover the lost secrets of the Ancients and explore the Multiverse.

name: Project: Aurora
description: Project: Aurora is an exploration game combining elements of RTS, survival and adventure games. You are the captain of the research mission, which lands on the surface of the newly discovered planet.

name: Survive Into Night
description: Stay alive by any means as you face hunger, thirst, limited supplies, and consistent threats from both the living and undead. Sneak and Hide quietly to avoid the undead, or blast your way through the hordes with guns out, making every bullet count. Help other survivors to earn resources for crafting, or let the weak fend for themselves - You'll face the consequences of your choices.

name: Finders Reapers: Attack & Defend Character Pack
description: Enhance your gameplay with this Finders Reapers Monsters & Icons character pack. Collect all the characters, complete your collection and take them online.

name: Finders Reapers: Evil & Nasty Character Pack
description: Enhance your gameplay with this Finders Reapers Monsters & Icons character pack. Collect all the characters, complete your collection and take them online.

name: Terra Firma
description: Play god and create your own world in this complex simulation. Plate tectonics, wind and water erosion and plant life all develop and interact to produce a world that is viewable from a single tree to kilometres across.

name: Refactor
description: Refactor is a light strategy tower defense game that tries to keep the core fun of the tower defense game as simple as possible, honing every detail of the rule design while making it a strategic and entertaining experience.

name: Ice Cream Truck
description: Screech, halt! Max and his ice cream truck reach an unfamiliar universe never seen before. Continue making your way as you go after the little kid’s balloon. Solve mysteries with emotion-flavored ice cream. Will you be able to retrieve the kid’s lost balloon?

name: Echostasis
description: An exploration of reality, technology, and our relationship to both - [ECHOSTASIS] offers an ever-evolving narrative that tells a story only possible through the medium of games.

name: Synthalgia: Retro Arcade Racing
description: Synthalgia is an arcade racing game set in the summers of the 1980’s. Drive dangerously, drive fast, earn credits, buy and upgrade cars all while jamming out to 80’s inspired music in a neon retrofuturistic world of fast cars, beaches and bright lights!

name: MK5 Mortal Kombat: Sub-Zero
description: MK5 Mortal Combat - Sub-Zero is a bootleg for the Sega Mega Drive and Sega Genesis consoles, published between 1997 and 1998, being distributed in an independent cartridge format. There is also a little known and difficult to find port of this same video game for the Super Nintendo / Super Famicom console, called Mortal Kombat Mythologies Gold 2000.

name: Street Fighter II: Ryu vs. Sagat
description: One of the best possible fights in Street Fighter 2. The karate genius, Ryu against the king of Thai Muay-Thai, Sagat. The Hadoken is easier to execute, as well as the Shoryuken. The classic punches are made with the keys A S D and the kicks with Z X C.

name: Phoenix Point: Behemoth Edition
description: Phoenix Point: Behemoth Edition includes the base game, plus four downloadable content expansions titled, “Blood and Titanium,” “Legacy of the Ancients,” “Festering Skies,” and “Corrupted Horizons.”

name: Infinite Jump
description: "Infinite jump" is a leisure game. Players need to press the space to let the ball jump through the obstacles. The difficulty of the game level will increase with the increase of the number.

name: Antonball Deluxe: Better Than Nothing
description: New Character, "Nothing". Players choosing to ball as Boiler City's most invisible citizen can challenge themselves to a new super-hard invisible mode! New "CLASSIC BALL TRAINING" world added to both campaign modes, for only the most practiced and talented ballers!

name: Fat Fritz 2.0 SE
description: Fat Fritz 2.0 is the successor to the revolutionary Fat Fritz, which was based on the famous AlphaZero algorithms. This new version takes chess analysis to the next level and is a must for players of all skill levels.

name: Antonball Deluxe: Fixed Gold Evil Baby Paul (Shiny)
description: Fixed Gold Evil Baby Paul (Shiny) is many things. He is Gold, he is Evil, he is a Baby, he is Paul, and he is definitely Shiny. Most importantly, he's FINALLY fixed.

name: Outsider: After Life
description: Outsider: After Life is a nostalgic puzzle adventure that takes you on a galactic journey with HUD-ini, an android who may be the only one who can prevent the end of the universe.

name: My Sexy Waitress
description: My Sexy Waitress this is exciting, puzzle game with Fancy Girls. Control your tube and find the way to pass the level and unlock a lot of beauty in the gallery My Sexy Waitress contain a nice mechanic, cute girls and awesome story.

name: 枝江往事
description: Sin descripción

name: Monsters' Den: Godfall - Protectorate Operations
description: Permanently unlock Operations in your current and future campaigns! Earn the six Operation-specific Artifact items to power up your company and offer exciting new build possibilities!

name: Battle Bands: Rock & Roll Deckbuilder
description: Get the band together and take on the world in this battle of the bands, deckbuilding card game set in the fantasy land of Riff City. Play solo or with friends to conquer competitive real-time tournaments or offbeat bosses in a coop campaign. Wits and a sick riff are key to becoming a rock legend.

name: Sensual Adventures: The Game
description: Brittany and Trinity are back in a new game from Puppetmaster! The girls are stuck in the apartment until their flight to Cairo and there's only one thing to do until then... mess around anywhere and everywhere.

name: Sensual Adventures: Episode 6
description: Trinity is feeling a bit sore after that marathon session by the pool, so she books in for a massage at one of the resort’s spa rooms. When her masseuse can’t make the appointment, however, Trinity will have to find another way to loosen up.

name: Sensual Adventures: Episode 5
description: Brittany and Trinity are off to Barbados to take in some much needed rest and relaxation. With a sexy waitress working at the private resort they're staying at. Before the girls can ask her to join them, however, their urges get the best of them and they start having fun by the poolside!

name: Naval Action: Le Requin
description: Le Requin is a perfect ship for hit and run operations and privateering. She can operate both from deep water and shallow water ports. Large crew allows you board enemies with confidence, and lateen sails profiles will help you escape from most dangers.

name: Naval Action: Redoutable
description: Redoutable is a Téméraire class 74-gun ship of the line. She fought against HMS Victory and 2 other ships during the Battle of Trafalgar, killing Vice Admiral Horatio Nelson during the action. She sank in the storm that followed the battle.

name: Naval Action: L'Hermione
description: Concorde class medium frigate giving you agility and firepower.

name: Naval Action: Leopard
description: Leopard is a beautiful fast 4th rate that served during French revolutionary wars, Napoleonic wars and the War of 1812 between United States and Britain.

name: Naval Action: HMS Victory 1765
description: HMS Victory. The oldest naval warship in commission. Built as in 1765 with original figurehead and decorated stern gallery. Designed by Slade one of the best naval architects of the age of sail era.

name: Naval Action: Admiralty Connection
description: Use your patronage to the admiralty to receive access to additional warehousing space, building permits and dock space.

name: Naval Action: Painter
description: Painter DLC is a consumable premium item that will give you access to all available ship paints in game.

name: Naval Action: Hercules
description: First flagship of the Argentinian Navy. Sturdy, fast and powerful.

name: Naval Action: Prolific Forger
description: Don't ask what you can do for your country. Ask what your country can do for you. If your country has done nothing, perhaps it is a time to change the nation. A famous document forger has lost everything in a tulipcoin bubble and is willing to work for almost nothing.

name: Naval Action: Rättvisan
description: Naval Action - Rättvisan is a powerful and agile 4th rate ship of the line.

name: Naval Action: Trincomalee
description: Oh the beautiful Trincomalee. The ultimate chase ship.

name: Naval Action: Navy Connection
description: Expand your docks, More outposts, More tow requests, More contracts What else does the Captain need?

name: Naval Action: Travel Balloon
description: The first flying vessel made of a globe of taffeta filled with air and an attached basket

name: Naval Action: Santa Ana
description: Santa Ana is a premium consumable second rate ship of the line designed by a famous Spanish naval engineer Romero Landa.

name: LesLove.Club: Emily and Sarah
description: A relaxing puzzle game for lesbians. Love is Love!

name: Terminus: Zombie Survivors
description: Terminus: Zombie Survivors is a 2D turn-based survival roguelike set during a zombie apocalypse. Each journey is unique, and every decision can mean the difference between life and death. Can you brave hunger, cold and the undead in order to reach the Terminus and find salvation?

name: Magic Defense
description: Welcome to the single-player strategy game made in the style of Tower Defense. You will plunge into the magical Middle Ages to build a powerful defense to protect the bag of gold from the raids made by greedy trolls and other magical characters

name: Brick Force: Navy Soldier
description: Join the elite of the elite and feel like a real covert operator with the Navy Soldier Pack - just don't whine when you get your anchor tattoo!

name: Brick Force: Black Knight
description: Get rid of those old rags and slip into the shining armor of the Black Knight!

name: DuelVox
description: DuelVox - a first-person shooter in the western style. Defeat all the cowboys and become the best shooter in the wild west!

name: Sweet Tooth
description: Sweet Tooth is a physical puzzle with a side view. I bet only 25% of people will pass all the levels and only 1% will collect all 3 candies in each level. So if you are looking for challenging puzzles, then welcome!

name: Chicken Invaders 3: Easter Edition
description: Dash across the galaxy... well, you get the picture. This time, you're up against the Easter bunny and his army of hatchlings!
