name: Halloween Trouble 2
description: Halloween Trouble 2 is a family friendly Match-3 game with fun challenges and mini games for extra fun! Complete fun match3 puzzles and help Granny restore her cottage so she can celebrate Halloween!

name: Dragu's Puzzle Adventure
description: Guide Dragu in this 3D Puzzle Adventure and try the challenging stages!

name: Fairytale Mosaics: Cinderella 2
description: Explore amazing worlds! Let your imagination roam free! Hurry and get to the ball before the wicked sisters!

name: Sherman Commander
description: Command a platoon of Sherman tanks over the most famous theatres of WW2. Take the commander’s seat and give specific orders to your crew, or open the tactical map to coordinate your actions with accompanying units.

name: Good puzzle
description: Good puzzle - this puzzle type logic game. In the game, you need to collect a full-fledged image from small pieces that are randomly scattered across the screen. The image displayed on the puzzle of the different subjects

name: Witchcraft U
description: Cast spells, mix potions, and break hexes as a first-year magical studies major in this dark academia game of horror, crime, and intrigue!

name: I Lost My Luggage
description: I Lost My Luggage is a chaotic organization game. Find people their lost luggage back, and keep the facility organized!

name: Shattered Worlds
description: Follow Prometheus, his trusty wardog pet Snap, his new pirate friend Calenda and the honorable spirit knight Karul in a grand and full of exploration adventure! Defeat monsters, find secret rooms, complete quests, earn items and loot, fight with fierce bosses and learn about the mythos of Astus!

name: Space Fat: To the Core
description: Starting in space battle your way through all the layers of the atmosphere and into the planet itself in this roguelike vertically scrolling shooter. Can you survive long enough and make it To The Core?

name: Velucity
description: VELUCITY, a rhythm game with a new feel, is released in Steam through Early Access! Enjoy the game with a keyboard that anyone can easily start with.

name: LightWave
description: Lightwave is a platformer project gone full indie. Inspired by classic platformers and modern indie titles alike, this 2D pixel platformer features highspeed, fluid movement.

name: Ultimate Under Water
description: Ultimate Under Water is a clean and stylish interactive 3D live wallpaper that display cute low-poly under water fishes on the desktop with animated backgrounds. You can control and interact with fishes with your mouse.

name: Rooten
description: There is only you and the Forest. In "Rooten" there are no compulsory tasks, time just goes by, and days pass by independently of you. You can explore the Forest, try to get out, or even do nothing at all. The forest has always been here, and always will be. You won't change it no matter what.

name: VoidOut Parkour
description: Can you escape the Void? Make your way across the sky in this challenging 3D platformer to see if you can avoid being consumed!

name: Emperium
description: An epic adventure filled with loot, and monsters. Enter the world of Emperium!

name: All For Nought: Tic Tac Toe
description: Classic Tic Tac Toe / Noughts & Crosses game with a minimalist style.

name: Labyrinth 2
description: A relaxing labyrinth game.

name: Kittens of Fear
description: Kittens of Fear is a fast-paced, first-person horror game. 100% jump-scare free.

name: Samurai Cooking
description: The rules are simple. Just cut the food.

name: Knitted and Inflatable
description: Knitted And Inflatable is a story about the stand-off between The World of Knitted and The World of Inflatable. It's a fresh look onto First Person Shooters that brings challenge, physics and cute visuals without blood, gore and violence!

name: Enlightened Sentinel
description: Enlightened Sentinel - spectacular battles and tranquil exploration. From shady forests to the royal castle - the hero has a difficult path ahead. Sword and magic will help the Enlightened one to walk through a deeply thought out colorful world.

name: Dash and Fire
description: "Dash and fire" uses hand-painted super fire animation style, and is famous for its shocking and refreshing sense of attack. Precise attack judgment, hard straight, floating, combo, body and other pure fighting game settings are designed to bring players the top-level action game experience.

name: Love Mystery Club
description: This game is based on the theme of love & light reasoning. Even if you choose the wrong option, it will not lead to game over. It is very suitable for casual players who like love reasoning but don't want to waste their brain cells.

name: Starlight: Eye of the Storm
description: Starlight: Eye of The Storm is a retro 2D Arcade vertical shooter. Unleash your special powers, upgrade your weapons! Be challenged with 10 stages of bullet hell. Drift (auto-pivot mode) behind your enemies and take them on with style!

name: Cyber Rider
description: "Cyber Rider" is a super high-speed arcade racing game. Your only goal is to avoid the cars on the road and keep moving forward, and strive to continuously break the score records you created before. This game can be played with one hand.

name: Demonicute
description: Hardcore platformer.

name: Forever Night
description: Action adventure game with a great and atmospheric storyline and open world

name: VR King of Battle Cards
description: A fantasy-style card game submerges you in the history of the world of Phantor, which was invaded by the evil and cruel King Revelant. Take part in the battles for liberation of the world as part of the Union of Kings. Gather your army and defeat Revelant in the epic battle.

name: World's Worst Handyman
description: Suit up as the "World's Worst Handyman" in this comedy stealth game where every job is a chaotic adventure! Dodge disgruntled clients, bungle repairs, and save your beloved animal shelter from bankruptcy.

name: Yaengard
description: Yaengard is a tabletop-like strategic RPG, bringing the excitement of dice-RPGs into a digital roguelike adventure. Evolve your party of villagers into heroes through challenging decisions & forged personalities. Combine abilities, equipment, and character traits into something truly powerful.

name: Floor 100
description: Floor 100 is a Free-to-play Topdown 2D Multiplayer Online RPG with many common MMO features and a competitive tower with 100 floors of epic bosses.

name: Caste
description: Bring life back to the the world of Caste! Join a fantasy world together with many other players online. Build your house and place furniture inside. Build your farm with a huge variety of crops!

name: Swordian Hero
description: Use swords and magic to defeat monsters! A refreshing action game!

name: Wotheguel
description: Do the tasks given in the tropical forest and get all the magic diamonds. Kill the resulting creatures and continue your mission. Protect yourself in the open world and remember that you are alone.

name: B 2
description: b 2: online-only multiplayer --- an alien place --- you are the bee: fly where you want, play as you like

name: Five-Finger Gunslinger
description: Five-Finger Gunslinger is a third-person online arena-battle game where players compete against their friends to become the most popular kid in the west.

name: My Eyes
description: Use your laser vision to climb and fly your way through perilous caves and make your way back to your body. Keep in mind, it hurts to shoot lasers out of your eyes and you can only stand so much pain. It's also deadly to keep your eyes closed, as the heat from the laser builds up inside your head.

name: World of Soccer Reloaded
description: Unlike other similar soccer games, the user controls a single player instead of an entire team! World of Soccer RELOADED combines individuality and team play!

name: Liberty Fighters
description: Liberty Fighters is a classic retro shoot’em up game with mixed rpg elements that adds an unique touch to this game. You explore a space station full of interactive characters and make impactful choices through the story. Fight action tense space combat missions with your upgradable spaceship.

name: Snow Apocalypse
description: Hunt and kill as much zombies as you can. How long can you stay alive in the Snow Apocalypse?

name: Aggressive Robot Vacuum
description: Aggressive Robot Vacuum-a robot vacuum cleaner simulator with a top view, where your task is to clean up the mess in one minute! Beware of hard and sharp objects, because they can cause the robot to explode! Collect coins to improve cleaning performance and most importantly-clean up the trash!

name: Mr. Walker's Basement
description: Will you be able to escape the horrors that unfold under your neighbor's home? This atmospheric point-and-click survival horror game with elements of mystery and story-rich scares will leave you DYING to uncover the truth. Beware the wax figures that lurk in the basement....

name: Hentai in the Forest
description: Hentai In The Forest is a Survival game in an open world full of dangers, interesting places and valuable resources.

name: Cascading Failure
description: Lead your troops into battle first hand in an intense Sci-Fi world. Construct bases, build defences, construct bigger bases, build way too many defences and take the map with overwhelming amounts of infantry, mechs and firepower.

name: hexceed: Inventa Pack
description: The sixth addition to hexceed, bringing 110 exciting new levels! This world includes all previously introduced mechanics!

name: Hexceed: Stella
description: The first DLC world for hexceed, unlocking the exciting new world: Stella! Enjoy a new world filled with new puzzles to complete!

name: Last Memory
description: The soul, leaving its body, passes through the last memories in order to find peace.

name: hexceed: Animo
description: Unlocks a new world for hexceed: Amino brings 122 new puzzles with a brand new mechanic to shake things up!

name: hexceed: Cessabit Pack
description: Unlocks a new world for hexceed: Cessabit brings 125 new puzzles with a brand new mechanic to shake things up!

name: hexceed: Clavis Pack
description: The fourth addition to hexceed, bringing 110 exciting new levels! This world includes the Rotating Tile mechanic that was introduced in Animo!

name: hexceed: Iter Pack
description: The third addition to hexceed, bringing 160 exciting new levels! This world includes the Rotating Tile mechanic that was introduced in the previous world, Animo!

name: Nopperabou
description: It is a search-type horror game set in a mansion where curses live."Nopperabo" who became a curse after the tragic event You reached the end,Can you enshrine the curse?

name: Ulna Online
description: Ulna Online is a free multiplayer electronic game (MMORPG) developed by Moscano. It started to be created in 2017. In it, players can develop the skills of their characters, search for treasures.

name: Wilma's Dreams
description: A lens into the mind of a dog.

name: Heroic Adventures
description: "Heroic Adventures" is a game based on the "3 in a row" mechanics. The main goal of the "match 3" genre is reduced to the composition of groups, lines and rows of 3 or more identical items.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Sister of the Thorn
description: The Sister of the Thorn is a new support career for Kerillian. It contains the new playable career complete with new abilities, new weapon types, a new talent tree, a whole new skin, a new hat, new challenges, and new voice lines.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Grail Knight Career
description: The Grail Knight is a new career for Markus Kruber. It contains the new playable career complete with a new talent tree, new weapon types, new abilities, a whole new Bretonnian Knight skin, and more.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Outcast Engineer Career
description: The Outcast Engineer is a new career for Bardin Goreksson. It contains the new playable career complete with new abilities, new weapon types, a new talent tree, a whole new Engineer skin, a new helmet, new challenges, and new voice lines.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Forgotten Relics Pack
description: The Forgotten Relics Pack is a weapon and cosmetic pack containing the following items:5 new weapons.4 new paintings.1 new portrait frame.

name: Potion Permit
description: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a brewing cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

name: Baby Bear's Big Day Out
description: After coming out of hibernation early, you need to find honey to wake up the rest of your bear family! Solve dozens of puzzles in this cute sokoban-style adventure, while meeting other woodland animals. Discover your surroundings as you explore peaceful meadows, icy valleys and bubbling swamps!

name: 汉武大帝传
description: Classic single player game

name: Buildest
description: Take on the role of an architect in different historical eras. Lead a brigade of honest hard workers to build it - from modest hovels for peasants to pompous skyscrapers of megacities.

name: Sponsor-A-Planet
description: First-Person world-creation-simulator game!

name: Feeling Square?
description: This game is hard; back to the basics of pixel graphics, the goal of the game is to reach the end of the level. You will die over and over again learning the in and out of the levels. How long will you take? can you beat the game with your sanity still in tack? Now with Update 2.0!!

name: Be: Twin
description: Be:Twin is a top-down shooter set in an aplocalyptic version of Seoul. What will happen once the twins find what they have lost?

name: Backfire
description: A single-player arcade shooter where your bullets ricochet against enemies and walls. It's a bullet hell game too, if you shoot enough.

name: Fill and Cross Royal Riddles
description: Solve the king's puzzles and gain access to his treasures!

name: Outgun
description: Outgun is a multiplayer capture the flag game, with minimalist graphics in 2D top-view.

name: Monstermonger
description: A strategic fantasy digital board game. Build a team to capture monsters. Choose whether to sell them for gold, or tame them and use their skills to help capture even bigger monsters. Gold now, or more gold later - only you can decide!

name: Helix Slider
description: A fast paced action avoidance game that will hopefully not make you barf. Spin around an endless twisting tube and slide your way past all the obstacles for as long as you can!

name: Thrilling Triple Treat
description: What do you get if you mix a platformer with a metroidvania and something in between but then seperate that mix into three games that are then collected into a single game? Nonsense. You get nonsense. This game is nonsense. But dear, is it funny!

name: Armageddon Onslaught
description: In 2060 the end of the world has come, and humanity is on the edge of extinction. Against the army of Hell, four formidable warriors, known as the Demi-Angels, arise. They will have to face horrors of all kinds and fulfill the darkest of the prophecies.

name: Invaliens
description: Retro arcade classic, Defeat a million invaders from another dimension in this side scrolling shoot'em up.

name: Completely Lar Lar
description: This is the first Completely Lar Lar game, which is a platforming puzzle solver in a fantasy mosaic world that's been created in Unity. Help Completely get to the end of the game to beat the boss man dude.

name: My Little Village
description: My Little Village is a strategic city building game where the player gets to control villagers individually. As a leader you get to improve the skills of each villager and inspect their family trees. Are you ready to be leader of a your little village?

name: Gateball VR
description: Realize outdoor gateball sports in VR! 4 stages of realistic outdoor scenes (park day / night, beach day / night) Play from 1 to 5 players on a single device

name: Shleepy Time Catching Z's
description: Can't sleep and you can't imagine sheep? Catch the sheep with the bed and bounce them succesfully to the other side, faster and faster, while avoiding or defeating enemies sent by the Sandman.

name: Mediterranean Assault: 1943
description: Delivering Hectic firefights, Mediterranean Assault: 1943 takes players across some of Italy and Africa's forgotten fronts.

name: The Haunted Exmone Theatre
description: The Haunted Exmone Theatre is a 2D Survival Horror Game based on the story of a paranormal investigator called Omar, who got an urgent call from the owner of the Exmone Theatre to investigate the building for the paranormal evidence.

name: Rainbow Reactor: Fusion
description: Get ready for a puzzling adventure at the Rainbow Reactor - where story-driven exploration is fused together with frantic color-matching gameplay!

name: Frisbee For Fun
description: Frisbee is joy, frisbee is fun! You are a very mischievous kitten that uses helpless chickens as targets.

name: Ancient World War
description: This is a Sandbox + Moba Third-Person Game, Players 2 vs 2 compete with each other; Players can create flame towers , city walls and soldiers on the map and You can kill enemy merchants so that enemy players can't buy items.

name: Poco In
description: Let's guide Poco-chan to the goal! This game is a simple maze game. Remove objects with a revolver.

name: Mortem: Fallen Kingdom
description: Mortem: Fallen Kingdom is an open world souls-like RPG. Explore the world and take part in rewarding action combat.

name: Trials of Argolis
description: Every year daring warriors and fighters from all across the land travel to the province of Argolis to partake in a sacred trial of strength and endurance.

name: 3d Maze In Space
description: 3d labyrinth with procedurally generated levels. Character wakes up in an incomprehensible place and gradually remembers what happened, while making his assumptions about where he got into.

name: Dere Exe: Rebirth of Horror
description: Experience the terrifying first chapter in a series of platformer horror games.

name: Landers: Black Moon
description: Landers: Black Moon is a sci-fi puzzle game. After the landing of HEX-Rockets on the moon, you need to find the correct positions for the lasers to turn on all the system. What happens next will blow your mind.

name: MetaPhysical
description: In MetaPhysical you and up to 5 other friends can go on the hunt for eerie creatures to put an end to their sinister activities! Whether it's an ordinary ghost or a demon, your task is to identify the rumbling creature and then finish it off.

name: Greed Knights
description: Greed Knights is a game where your main focus is to grind for weapons and talent points so you can advance in the dungeons.this game works like most of my previous games. It contains automatic battles and your main focus is to train your champion and see him grow.

name: Lonely Birds
description: A puzzler where you reunite separated PEARakeets with their match by clicking on pairs of animals to make them move towards each other. It starts simple but grows challenging quickly over the many available levels, all in a pretty, cozy and cute setting.

name: Elysium Above
description: In SRPG Elysium Above, you will be a Commander of state Bo to direct the heroes to fight against enemies, and defend the newly restored land that has been annexed for 11 years! Wit the era of chaos and excitement with eight heroes!

name: RunDrill
description: RunDrill is a 2D run game.You control the Landrill, a machine that cracks rocks and breaks the ground to advance.Let's run through the vast subterranean world!

name: Riot Control Simulator
description: Take on the role of a Riot Control officer and control a riot. You can either brutally deal with the crowd or use more reasonable options. Will you decide to support a nascent dictatorship?

name: Madness Robots
description: A game where you must protect a ship from an atack of evil robots, with the help of turrets and other devices

name: Oaths of Light
description: Play as a young woman whose life is forever changed by a series of unexpected events.Unfold mysteries, enjoy non-linear storytelling with branching paths based on your choices, and engage in JRPG-inspired battles mixing real-time and turn-based elements.

name: Corridor: Amount of Fear
description: Corridor: Amount of Fear is a psychological horror for one person. Prepare for the wildest adventure ever. And remember... No one will help you.

name: Battle Bugs
description: In this unconventional real-time strategy game, control a fearsome army of stink bugs, cockroaches, lightning bugs, ants and more in a miniature, pun-filled warzone! 56 battles with 22 types of Battle Bug await you!
